item.title: A set of mods S RJL 1.5.x ETS2
item.description:
A set of mods S RJL 1.5.x ETS2

ATTENTION! I made these mods for myself and maybe you don’t need it.
Euro Truck Simulator 2

A set of mods for working for hire, without having your own truck.
All companies will have only a SCANIA Streamline by RJL truck for cargo transportation.
I am not interested in buying a truck for myself.
I take each order, if desired, in any available city.
I try to use a minimum of mods

List of mods with connection priority:
1). Company_only_truck_Scania_S_RJL_.scs
2). ETS2_Combo_Mod_ver.5.5_.scs
3). Interior_for_Scania_by_RJL_.scs – this mod can be left unused
4). RJL_Scania_R_Streamline_1.51_.scs

Archive: ETS2_A_set_of_mods_S_RJL.rar ~130mb



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MAN TGX 2020 Add-ons v1.6 ETS2
item.description:
MAN TGX 2020 Add-ons v1.6 ETS2

Changelogs v1.6
– support 1.51
– added parts from MAN eTGX and MAN hTGX package

This mod adds parts of the packages:
– Individual Lion S
– MAN eTGX
– MAN hTGX
as well as some improvements and additions of various parts.

Add Individual Pack parts:
– black light bar
– black lower grill guard bar
– black side bar
– sideskirt
– mirror cams
– dark red mirrors
– front bage plate
– sunshield (fixed)
– lower seats (table mode)

Add parts:
– luxury leather black seats
– luxury leather black&white seats
– interiors with cabinets

This mod is not compatible with Madster’s Analog Dashboard



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: FORD LTL 9000 v2.1 1.51.x ATS
item.description:
FORD LTL 9000 v2.1 1.51.x ATS

v2.1 Changes:
– Adaptation to ATS 1.51.x.
– Added interior shadows feature.
– Fixed posible crash on mods dealer.

FEATURES:
– 2 cabins.
– 1 chassis.
– Quick jobs (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
– Desktop truck (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
– Corrected MAT and DEF files.
– Fixed cabin accessories position.
– Fixed Sleeper cab glass.
– Fixed 5th wheel.
– Locale files improved.
– Corrected rear bumpers.
– Corrected license plates.
– Added license plate light.
– Metallic paint (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
– Improved lights.
– Added to traffic (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
– And some more fixes and improvements…
– You need SiS’L megapack to have all cabin accessories available.
– (ALL CABIN AND EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES AVAILABLE ONLY IN FULL VERSION).

Clean gamelog!!



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Sound Fixes Pack 9th year anniversary v24.45 ETS2
item.description:
Sound Fixes Pack 9th year anniversary v24.45 ETS2

CHANGELOG v24.45
1 new additional variation of the default air cutoff sound for when the governor unloads the air compressor.
Comprehensive sounds added to the Stadler FLIRT train locomotive. [ETS2 edition] Engine sounds added to the 1986 Moskvitch 2141 Aleko in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition] Sounds added to the 1997 Bombardier Double-decker Coach. [ETS2 edition] Replaced engine sound for the 2006 Ford F-350 XL Super Duty Regular Cab Ambulance in ProMods Canada in AI traffic. [ATS edition] 1 new Hadley H00640RP horn sound variant added for the 2018 Mack Anthem and the 2014 Volvo VNL in AI traffic. [ATS edition]

DESCRIPTION
This mod has been bringing more immersion to common sounds in the game for over 9 years!

It packs a variety of sound content within one mod, making it great value within the 100 mod limit in Convoy multiplayer.

COMPATIBILITY
– ETS2 1.51.1 + ATS 1.51.2. No errors in game log. Must have high priority in Mod Manager.
– Does not replace individual player truck sounds, so this mod can be used with an unlimited amount of truck sound mods of your choice.
– Compatible with all maps and all trucks, including truck mods.
– Supported in single-player and multiplayer Convoy mode, and is marked as an optional mod in Convoy.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
Requires higher priority in Mod Manager than:
– any map mods (e.g. ProMods)
– any AI traffic mods (e.g. traffic packs and traffic pack add-ons)
– any rain sound mods

FEATURE LIST
The mod features meticulously crafted sounds, covering the following:

– Suspension and tire bump sounds for your truck and trailer.
– Fuel / filling station sounds.
– Door close and seatbelt sounds after refueling.
– Train sound enhancements for several locomotives and railroad cars.
– Country/state specific railroad crossing bell sounds.
– The most complete tire sound package for all terrains: asphalt, gravel, grass, snow, and sleeper lines.
– Wet tire sound for the player’s truck tires when the asphalt roads are wet.
– Reworked tire screech/skid sound effects.
– Nokia phone ringtone sound replacing the hurry up / late music, leading to less stress for the player.
– Default common sound reworks, such as improved default air brake sounds.
– AI traffic vehicle sound improvements, with engine and horn sounds uniquely set for specific vehicles.
– English AU/UK/US voice navigation variants with speaker effect added and uncustomary phrases removed.
– Wind buffeting and rush of air sounds at high speeds only when the window is open.
– More environmental and ambient sounds, and tasteful changes to existing ambient sounds in the game world.
– Trailer coupling and trailer brace rotation sounds.
– 5 standalone air horns.
– Dynamic rain sounds, and an assortment of different thunder sounds with delay.
– The default wiper sound may now squeak only when the windshield is dry.
– Default gear grinding sound effect additions and improvements.
– Stronger reverb effects when under bridges and overpasses.
– (ATS only) Drawbridge lift warning sound for the Columbia River Interstate Bridge.
– (ATS only) Working sounds for the Musical Road on the Historic Route 66.
– (Optional) Reefer / refrigerated trailer sound functionality.
– (Optional – ATS only) Cop scouting reports via CB radio (enable in voice navigation options).
– Fixes for World Ambient sound glitches from the vanilla game and/or mods.

For further immersion, the mod may also include official paint colors and more authentic specifications for each AI traffic vehicle it modifies for sound. Rarer paint colors are less likely to be seen.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
